title: Choices
description: Please note: This self published version is no longer available.Six months after the events at Castle Black, everything has changed for Liv O’Dell. The people in her life, her home, her job, nothing is the same. The only constant is her beloved Louboutins. She struggles to get back the life she wanted and was so close to having but she is the only one prepared to fight to get it back. The added worry of the mysterious Hunter and her energy sapping powers just making things worse, along comes the fun loving Sebastian who turns her head but is there more to him than meets the eye? He is forbidden fruit but that just makes him more appealing. With her husband living in a different city, her charge abandoning her, a sire who can’t get over her betrayal and an Alpha mate to deal with all Liv wants is a bit of a time out but with the appearance of yet another of her loyal subjects, has the group traipsing across country where she learns more about her heritage, suffers a confusing and involuntary ordeal and a shocking ending that has her twisting in the wind. How will Liv and her boys get out of this one intact? Book 4 in The Forever Series.
author: Eve Newton
